name: Dining Room
longDesc:
You are in the DINING ROOM.
There is a doorway to the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY and an exit to the YARD.
There is a large window which looks out onto the street.
One wall is open to the LIVING ROOM.
description:
You are in the DINING ROOM.
There is a doorway to the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY and an exit to the YARD.
One wall is open to the LIVING ROOM.

dining room table.name: dining room table
dining room table.description:
The dining room table is tall, mahogany, and set for a formal dinner party for no discernible reason.
They left the candelabra out but you can't see any candles from here.
Better climb the table to get a better look

painting.name: painting
painting.description:
Giant wall sized painting of sandy beach,
and a dining room table set with a bunch of melty candles,
an old computer from the 80s
and corn flakes strewn all over.
Art is weird.

candelabra.name: candelabra
candelabra.description: The candelabra has spots for three candles.
candelabra.discoveryStatement: There remains a tiny numb of a candle in the third spot.

candle.name: candle
candle.description: The tiniest nub of a candle that could still be considered a candle
